TextLibrary.Text: You have failed to gain entry into the citadel. You must try again.
You have failed to gain entry into the Throne Room. You must try again.
You must defeat a guardian Doomknight to gain entry to the citadel.
You must defeat an Iron Golem to gain entry to the Throne Room.
You have finally confronted Lord Bane. All that remains is to defeat him!
You have gained entry into the citadel. Now you must travel deeper inside.
You have gained entry into the Throne Room.
